assessment_item.title: 'ಭಾರತದ ನೈಜ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಯೆಂದರೆ, ಅದು ಗ್ರಾಮಗಳ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ’ ಎಂದು ಹೇಳಿದವರು ಯಾರು?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

'ಭಾರತದ ನೈಜ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಯೆಂದರೆ, ಅದು ಗ್ರಾಮಗಳ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ’ ಎಂದು ಹೇಳಿದವರು ಯಾರು?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಜವಹರಲಾಲ್ ನೆಹರು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3257"},{"text":"

ಮಹಾತ್ಮ ಗಾಂಧೀಜಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:3258"},{"text":"

ಬಿ.ಆರ್.ಅಂಬೇಡ್ಕರ್ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3268"},{"text":"

ವಲ್ಲಭಬಾಯಿ ಪಟೇಲ್ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3273"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"'ಭಾರತದ ನೈಜ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಯೆಂದರೆ, ಅದು ಗ್ರಾಮಗಳ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ’ ಎಂದು ಹೇಳಿದವರು ಯಾರು?
